mapper.select: SELECT userName ,password FROM tb_user WHERE userName = #{username} AND password = #{password}
SELECT password FROM tb_user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM tb_user WHERE username = #{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (username, password, position, workPlace, telephone, role) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{position}, #{workPlace}, #{telephone}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET password = #{password}, position = #{position}, telephone = #{telephone}, workPlace = #{workPlace}, role = #{role}, updateTime = NOW() WHERE userId = #{userId}
